def_cn: 有意的;精心计划的;蓄谋的
def_en: If something is calculated to have a particular effect, it is specially done or arranged in order to have that effect.
If you say that something is not calculated to have a particular effect, you mean that it is unlikely to have that effect.
You can describe a clever or dishonest action as calculated when it is very carefully planned or arranged.

def_cn: (风险)认为值得一试的，权衡考虑过的
def_en: If you take a calculated risk, you do something which you think might be successful, although you have fully considered the possible bad consequences of your action.
